rounds.category: KINGS OF ENGLAND NOT BORN IN ENGLAND

clues.text: He was born in Falaise, Normandy circa 1028 & won a big battle on English soil 38 years later

rounds.text: President Madison is credited with the 1st of these 2-word actions; he didn't sign an 1812 bill after Congress had adjourned
